trans-unit.source: Version 6.0 of pyVmomi has some problems with SSL error handling on certain versions of Python. If using version 6.0 of pyVmomi, Python 2.6, Python 2.7.9, or newer must be present. This is due to an upstream dependency in pyVmomi 6.0 that is not supported in Python versions 2.7 to 2.7.8. If the version of Python is not in the supported range, you will need to install an earlier version of pyVmomi. See Issue #29537 for more information.
trans-unit.target: pyVmomi 6.0版在某些Python版本上存在SSL错误处理方面的问题。如果使用pyVmomi 6.0版，则必须提供Python 2.6，Python 2.7.9或更高版本。这是由于pyVmomi 6.0中的上游依赖关系，Python 2.7至2.7.8版本不支持。如果Python的版本不在支持的范围内，则需要安装pyVmomi的早期版本。有关更多信息，请参见问题＃29537。

trans-unit.source: We recommend the JSON format for most HTTP requests. urlencoded data is simple and cannot express complex data structures -- and that is often required for some Salt commands, such as starting a state run that uses Pillar data. Salt's CLI tool can reformat strings passed in at the CLI into complex data structures, and that behavior also works via salt-api, but that can be brittle and since salt-api can accept JSON it is best just to send JSON.
trans-unit.target: 我们推荐大多数HTTP请求使用JSON格式,urlencoded数据很简单,不能表达复杂的数据结构--而这对于一些Salt命令来说往往是需要的,比如启动使用Pillar数据的状态运行。Salt的CLI工具可以将CLI处传入的字符串重新格式化为复杂的数据结构,这种行为也可以通过salt-api来实现,但这可能会很脆,由于salt-api可以接受JSON,所以最好只发送JSON。

trans-unit.source: When merge_pillar is set as True, the final list of filters generated by merging the filters from filters with those defined in the pillar (if any): new filters are prepended at the beginning, while existing ones will preserve the position. trans-unit.source: When use_cmd_unzip is omitted, Salt will choose which extraction function to use based on the source archive and the arguments passed to the state. trans-unit.source: When a dataset is rolled back, all data that has changed since the snapshot is discarded, and the dataset reverts to the state at the time of the snapshot. By default, the command refuses to roll back to a snapshot other than the most recent one.

trans-unit.source: When a highstate is called, the minion automatically caches a copy of the last high data. If you then run a highstate with cache=True it will use that cached highdata and won't hit the fileserver except for salt:// links in the states themselves.
trans-unit.target: 调用高态时，奴才自动缓存上一个高数据的副本。如果您随后使用cache = True运行高状态，它将使用已缓存的高数据，并且不会击中文件服务器，只有州本身的 salt:// 链接除外。

trans-unit.source: When a password is changed on the host to one in the list of possible passwords, the further down on the list the password is, the longer individual commands will take to return. This is due to the nature of pyVmomi's login system. We have to wait for the first attempt to fail before trying the next password on the list.
trans-unit.target: 当在主机上将密码改为可能密码列表中的一个时,密码越往下,单个命令返回的时间就越长。这是由于pyVmomi的登录系统的特性。我们必须等待第一次尝试失败后才能尝试列表中的下一个密码。

trans-unit.source: When creating a private hosted zone, the region of the associated VPC is required. If not provided, an effort will be made to determine it from VPCId or VPCName, if possible. trans-unit.target: 创建私人托管区时,需要提供相关 VPC 的区域。如果没有提供,我们将尽可能通过 VPCId 或 VPCName 确定该区域。如果给定的 VPCName 存在于绑定帐户可见的多个区域中,则会失败,在这种情况下,您需要为 VPCRegion 提供一个明确的值。

trans-unit.source: When defining the profile group settings, the device can only support either a profile group or individual settings. If both are specified, the profile group will be preferred and the individual settings are ignored. If neither are specified, the value will be set to system default of none.
trans-unit.target: 定义配置文件组设置时,设备只能支持配置文件组或个人设置。如果两者都指定,则优先选择配置文件组,而忽略个别设置。如果两者都不指定,则该值将被设置为系统默认值 "无"。

trans-unit.source: When encountering an error (e.g. invalid message), yields {}, the caller can proceed to the next message
trans-unit.target: 当遇到错误(如无效消息)时,产生{},调用者可以继续下一条消息。

trans-unit.source: When executing a command or script, the state (i.e., changed or not) of the command is unknown to Salt's state system. Therefore, by default, the cmd state assumes that any command execution results in a changed state.
trans-unit.target: 当执行命令或脚本时，Salt的状态系统不知道命令的状态（即，是否更改）。因此，默认情况下， cmd 状态假定任何命令执行都会导致状态更改。

trans-unit.source: When generating keys and encrypting passwords use --local when using salt-call for extra security. Also consider using just the salt runner nacl when encrypting pillar passwords.
trans-unit.target: 在生成密钥和加密密码时,使用 salt-call 时使用 --local,以提高安全性。在加密支柱密码时,也可以考虑只使用 salt runner nacl。

trans-unit.source: When grains are loaded they are not loaded in the same way that modules are loaded, grain functions are detected and executed, the functions MUST return a dict which will be applied to the main grains dict. This module will always be executed first, so that any grains loaded here in the core module can be overwritten just by returning dict keys with the same value as those returned here
trans-unit.target: 当谷物被加载时,它们的加载方式与模块的加载方式不同,谷物函数会被检测并执行,函数必须返回一个dict,这个dict将被应用到主谷物dict中。这个模块总是会先执行,所以在核心模块中这里加载的任何谷粒都可以被覆盖,只需返回与这里返回值相同的dict键就可以了

trans-unit.source: When using set_pixels the pixel values can sometimes change when you read them again using get_pixels. This is because we specify each pixel element as 8 bit numbers (0 to 255) but when they're passed into the Linux frame buffer for the LED matrix the numbers are bit shifted down to fit into RGB 565. 5 bits for red, 6 bits for green and 5 bits for blue. The loss of binary precision when performing this conversion (3 bits lost for red, 2 for green and 3 for blue) accounts for the discrepancies you see.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 set_pixels 时，当您再次使用 get_pixels 读取像素值时，有时可能会更改它们。这是因为我们将每个像素元素指定为8位数字（0到255），但是当它们被传递到LED矩阵的Linux帧缓冲区时，这些数字将向下移位以适合RGB565。红色为5位，红色为6绿色为5位，蓝色为5位。执行此转换时二进制精度的损失（红色损失3位，绿色损失2位，蓝色损失3位）是您看到的差异的原因。

trans-unit.source: Which matches the events having the error code BGP_PREFIX_THRESH_EXCEEDED from any network operating system, from any host and reacts, executing the increase_prefix_limit_on_thresh_exceeded.sls reactor, found under one of the file_roots paths.
trans-unit.target: 其中具有错误代码的事件相匹配 BGP_PREFIX_THRESH_EXCEEDED 从任何网络操作系统，从任何主机和反应，执行 increase_prefix_limit_on_thresh_exceeded.sls 反应器，中的一个下找到 file_roots 路径。

trans-unit.source: While AWS's documentation specifies individual ASCII characters which need to be encoded, we instead just try to force the string to one of escaped unicode or idna depending on whether there are non-ASCII characters present.
trans-unit.target: 虽然AWS的文档指定了需要编码的单个ASCII字符,但我们反而只是根据是否有非ASCII字符存在,尝试将字符串强制转为转义的unicode或idna之一。

trans-unit.source: While a file in Windows does have a 'primary group', this rarely used attribute generally has no bearing on permissions unless intentionally configured and is only used to support Unix compatibility features (e.g. Services For Unix, NFS services).
trans-unit.target: 虽然Windows中的文件确实有一个 "主组",但这个很少使用的属性通常对权限没有影响,除非有意配置,而且只用于支持Unix的兼容性功能(例如Service For Unix,NFS服务)。

trans-unit.source: While for GET operations (the functions prefixed by get_) the credentials are optional, there are some specific details that are visible only to authenticated users. Moreover, the credentials are required when adding or updating information. That means, the module can equally work out of the box without any further configuration with the limitations imposed by the PeeringDB API.
trans-unit.target: 对于GET操作（以 get_ 为前缀的函数），凭据是可选的，但有些特定的详细信息仅对经过身份验证的用户可见。此外，添加或更新信息时需要凭据。这意味着，该模块可以在没有任何其他配置的情况下即开即用地工作，不受PeeringDB API的限制。

trans-unit.source: While it should go without saying, this argument must be set to True to configure an IPv6 subnet. Also, if this option is turned on without an IPv6 subnet explicitly configured, you will get an error unless you have set up a fixed IPv6 subnet. Consult the Docker IPv6 docs for information on how to do this.
trans-unit.target: 尽管不用说，但是必须将此参数设置为 True 才能配置IPv6子网。另外，如果在未显式配置IPv6子网的情况下打开此选项，则除非设置了固定的IPv6子网，否则都会收到错误消息。有关如何执行此操作的信息，请查阅Docker IPv6文档。

trans-unit.source: While it should go without saying, this argument must be set to True to configure an IPv6 subnet. Also, if this option is turned on without an IPv6 subnet explicitly configured, you will get an error unless you have set up a fixed IPv6 subnet. Consult the Docker IPv6 docs for information on how to do this.

trans-unit.source: While on Junos (the semicolon is important to be added, otherwise the configuration won't be accepted by Junos):
trans-unit.target: 而在Junos上(分号很重要,要加上,否则配置不会被Junos接受)。

trans-unit.source: While support for this option was added in API version 1.24, its value was not added to the inpsect results until API version 1.26. The version of Docker which is available for CentOS 7 runs API version 1.24, meaning that while Salt can pass this argument to the API, it has no way of knowing the value of this config option in an existing Docker network.
trans-unit.target: 虽然在API 1.24版本中增加了对这个选项的支持,但它的值直到API 1.26版本才被添加到inpsect结果中。CentOS 7可用的Docker版本运行的是API 1.24版本,这意味着虽然Salt可以将这个参数传递给API,但它无法知道现有Docker网络中这个配置选项的值。

trans-unit.source: While the command is run within the container, it is initiated from the host. Therefore, the PID in the return dict is from the host, not from the container.
trans-unit.target: 虽然命令是在容器内运行的,但它是由主机发起的。因此,返回指令中的 PID 是来自主机,而不是来自容器。

trans-unit.source: With the addition of pygit2 support, git_pillar can now interact with authenticated remotes. Authentication works just like in gitfs (as outlined in the Git Fileserver Backend Walkthrough), only with the global authenication parameter names prefixed with git_pillar instead of gitfs (e.g. git_pillar_pubkey, git_pillar_privkey, git_pillar_passphrase, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 通过添加pygit2支持，git_pillar现在可以与经过身份验证的遥控器交互。身份验证的工作方式与gitfs一样（如Git Fileserver后端演练中所述），仅使用全局身份验证参数名称加上 git_pillar 而不是 gitfs （例如 git_pillar_pubkey ， git_pillar_privkey ， git_pillar_passphrase 等）。

trans-unit.source: With the release of Docker 1.13.1, the Execution Driver has been removed. Starting in versions 2016.3.6, 2016.11.4, and 2017.7.0, Salt defaults to using docker exec to run commands in containers, however for older Salt releases it will be necessary to set the docker.exec_driver config option to either docker-exec or nsenter for Docker versions 1.13.1 and newer.
trans-unit.target: 随着Docker 1.13.1的发布，执行驱动程序已被删除。从版本2016.3.6、2016.11.4和2017.7.0开始，Salt默认使用docker docker exec 在容器中运行命令，但是对于较旧的Salt版本，有必要将 docker.exec_driver 配置选项设置为docker docker-exec 或 nsenter (适用于Docker 1.13.1及更高版本）。

trans-unit.source: You probably want to use --async here and look up the job results later. If you're dead set on getting the output from the CLI command, then make sure to set the timeout (with the -t flag) to something greater than the splaytime (max splaytime + time to execute job). Otherwise, it's very likely that the cli will time out before the job returns.
trans-unit.target: 您可能要在这里使用--async，以便稍后查找工作结果。如果您对从CLI命令获取输出的设置不满意，请确保将超时（带有-t标志）设置为大于splaytime（最大splaytime +执行作业的时间）的值。否则，cli很可能在作业返回之前超时。

trans-unit.source: You are still allowed to use all the requisites, with a few restrictions. You cannot require or watch a state defined after the current state. Similarly, in a state, you cannot require_in or watch_in a state defined before it. Breaking any of the two restrictions above will result in a state loop. The renderer will check for such incorrect uses if this feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 您仍然可以使用所有必要条件，但有一些限制。您不能 require 或 watch 在当前状态之后定义的状态。同样，在一个状态下，您不能 require_in 或 watch_in 在其之前定义的状态。打破以上两个限制中的任何一个都会导致状态循环。如果启用了此功能，则渲染器将检查这种不正确的用法。

trans-unit.source: You can also use alarms from pillars, and override values from the pillar alarms by setting overrides on the resource. Note that 'boto_asg_alarms' will be used as a default value for all resources, if defined and can be used to ensure alarms are always set for an ASG resource.

trans-unit.source: You can also use alarms from pillars, and override values from the pillar alarms by setting overrides on the resource. Note that 'boto_dynamodb_alarms' will be used as a default value for all resources, if defined and can be used to ensure alarms are always set for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用支柱的警报,并通过在资源上设置覆盖来覆盖支柱警报的值。请注意,'boto_dynamodb_alarms'将作为所有资源的默认值,如果定义了,可以用来确保总是为资源设置报警。

trans-unit.source: You can also use alarms from pillars, and override values from the pillar alarms by setting overrides on the resource. Note that 'boto_elb_alarms' will be used as a default value for all resources, if defined and can be used to ensure alarms are always set for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用支柱的警报,并通过在资源上设置覆盖来覆盖支柱警报的值。请注意,如果定义了'boto_elb_alarms',它将作为所有资源的默认值,并可用于确保始终为资源设置报警。

trans-unit.source: You can pass it, but for fairly obvious reasons the results over multiple runs will be undefined and probably contrary to your desired state. Reducing the number of nodes requires an EXPLICIT CacheNodeIdsToRemove be passed, which until a reasonable heuristic for programmatically deciding which nodes to remove has been established, MUST be decided and populated intentionally before a state call, and removed again before the next. In practice this is not particularly useful and should probably be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 你可以传递它,但是由于相当明显的原因,多次运行的结果将是未定义的,并且可能与你所期望的状态相反。减少节点的数量需要传递一个EXPLICIT CacheNodeIdsToRemove,在一个合理的启发式编程决定哪些节点被移除之前,必须在一个状态调用前有意地决定和填充,并在下一个状态调用前再次移除。在实践中,这并不是特别有用,可能应该避免。

trans-unit.source: You can use lgpo.get_policy_info to get all the possible names that could be used in a state file or from the command line (along with elements that need to be set/etc). The key is to match the text you see in the gpedit.msc gui exactly, including quotes around words or phrases. The "full path" style is really only needed when there are multiple policies that use the same base name. For example, Access data sources across domains exists in ~10 different paths. If you put that through get_policy_info you'll get back a message that it is used for multiple policies and you need to be more specific.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 lgpo.get_policy_info 来获取状态文件或命令行（以及需要设置的元素等）中可能使用的所有名称。关键是要完全匹配您在 gpedit.msc gui中看到的文本，包括单词或短语周围的引号。仅当有多个使用相同基本名称的策略时，才真正需要“完整路径”样式。例如， Access data sources across domains 存在于大约10条不同的路径中。如果通过 get_policy_info 进行输入，则会返回一条消息，指出该消息用于多个策略，您需要更加具体。
